benchmark_details.name: OpenIE4++
benchmark_details.overview: OpenIE4++ is a multilingual corpus that consists of the original English data and their counterparts in other languages, created to enhance cross-lingual open information extraction.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance cross-lingual open information extraction by providing a multi-lingual corpus for training and evaluation.

data.source: Original English data augmented with translations and annotations into multiple languages using large language models.
data.annotation: Annotated using prompts with a large language model for multilingual extraction.

methodology.calculation: Utilized precision and recall to assess performance in information extraction.
methodology.interpretation: F1 Score measures the balance between precision and recall, indicating both the accuracy and completeness of information extraction.
methodology.validation: Trained and evaluated across multiple languages to assess the robustness of cross-lingual extraction.
